title: Traditional Italian Pasta Carbonara
description: A classic Roma pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and pepper.
steps: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.
Add pasta and cook until al dente.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large pan until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk eggs and Pecorino Romano cheese together.
Drain pasta, reserving some cooking water.
Add pasta to the pan with pancetta, remove from heat.
Quickly stir in egg and cheese mixture, adding pasta water as needed for creaminess.
Season with plenty of black pepper and serve immediately.
